title: Creamy Dijon Greek Yogurt Sandwich Spread
description: A high-protein, mayo-style spread using Greek yogurt, perfect for turkey, cucumber, and mozzarella sandwiches.
instructions: Add Greek yogurt, Dijon mustard, maple syrup, salt, pepper, and lemon juice to a small bowl.
Taste and adjust: add more Dijon for sharpness, more yogurt for thickness, or a touch more lemon juice for tang.
Spread onto bread and assemble your sandwich as usual.
notes: Swap Dijon for yellow mustard if you want milder flavor. Works well on turkey, chicken, or veggie sandwiches.
